title: Deepanshu Mahto
text: I am a final year undergraduate at IIIT Allahabad web-slinging my way through life, just like Spidey!.  As a passionate full-stack developer, I enjoy bringing new and creative ideas to the ever-changing world of web, leveraging them with cutting-edge tools and technology.  When I’m not coding, I’m either on the football field or behind the lens, capturing life’s moments with a keen eye. Currently, I am working at HireQuotient, helping clients build their dream teams, algorithmically.  Interested? I am always up for a coffee!

title: Deepanshu Mahto
text:
👩🏻‍💻 Projects

Placement Portal | 2023       
React Express.js Node.js MongoDB

A web-based application specifically designed to streamline and manage the activities of the Training and Placement Cell in a college.

Sonora | 2023       
Next.js React Node.js PostgreSQL OAuth Stripe

A feature-rich web application with song upload, Stripe payments, sleek UI design, Supabase authentication, Github login, file/image uploads, form validation, audio playback, favorites/playlists, and advanced player components. 

Gradly | 2023       
React Express.js Node.js MongoDB PayPal

A intuitive web based application to facilitate peer-to-peer transactions for surplus items among students enabling seamless transactions and promoting a sense of community within the student body.

Vacation Email Responder | 2023  
Node.js GMail API OAuth

A Node.js application that automates sending replies to unread emails while you are away. All replied emails are merged under a label. No double replies are ensured to avoid callback hell. 

CC Mirror | 2023  
HTML CSS Javascript CList API

A Chrome extension that provides a comprehensive list of contest details across major platforms, allowing for personalization according to individual preferences.
